GS40rascum_u:3187: grāsājīrṇarasaṃ pātya punaḥ saṃdīpya jārayet // Rcūm_16.84 //
GS40rascum_u:3188: tataḥ śulbasya tīkṣṇasya kāntasya rajatasya ca /

GS40rascum_u:3195: śatadhā daradavyūḍhaṃ tāmraṃ hi triguṇaṃ rase // Rcūm_16.87 //

GS40rascum_u:3213: valipalitavikāraṃ duḥkhadāridryamṛtyuṃ janayati varaputraṃ saccaritraṃ rasendraḥ // Rcūm_16.93 //
